HomePage.description: This is a sample portfolio page using Next.js and next-intl for internationalization.

Hero.aboutMe: Im a software developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional web applications. I love to learn new technologies and improve my skills. In my free time, I enjoy hiking, photography, and playing video games. Feel free to explore my portfolio and get in touch!

Skills.title: This is what i work with

Footer.copy: Daeralysdev Portfolio. Made with ❤️ in Holguin, Cuba.
Footer.inspiration: Took heavy inspiration from {name}. Made with love from Cuba, and to the world, a dreamer with its feet in the ground.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.paragraph1: I am a passionate software developer with a focus on creating efficient and scalable web applications. My journey in tech has been driven by a love for problem-solving and continuous learning.
AboutMe.paragraph2: With experience in various programming languages and frameworks, I enjoy building user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to take on new challenges.

Story.title: My Journey
Story.description: This is the story of my journey as a developer.
